titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to increase the existing dollar limitation on the total amount of the Federal payments which may be made to Puerto Rico in any fiscal year under the medicaid program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 6/9/1987--Introduced. Amends part A (General Provisions) of title XI of the Social Security Act to increase the total amount of Federal payments which may be made to Puerto Rico under title XIX (Medicaid) of the Act.
